alert.note: Alert for Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kent County through 315 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sandtown to near Rising Sun-Lebanon to near Big Stone Beach. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover, Smyrna, Camden, Clayton, Cheswold, Bowers, Woodside, Viola, Hartly, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Hazlettville, Dover Base Housing, Dover Speedway, Sandtown, Rising Sun, Big Stone Beach, Wyoming, Felton, Frederica and Kenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
